title: Erigon v2.53.1 ignores --port option
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2.53.1-5b34a0fa

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
`erigon --batchSize=2G --internalcl --lightclient.discovery.port=4004 --lightclient.discovery.tcpport=4005 --sentinel.port=7777 --graphql --authrpc.jwtsecret /opt/jwt.hex --torrent.download.rate=200mb --snapshots=true --chain=mainnet --datadir=/opt/erigon/mainnet --port=30307 --http.port=8546 --authrpc.port=8552 --torrent.port=42070 --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9091 --http --ws --http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon \
    --prune.h.before=11052984 --prune.r.before=11052984 --prune.t.before=11052984 --prune.c.before=11052984`

#### Expected behaviour
`erigon should bind port 30307`

#### Actual behaviour
`erigon binds port 30303`


#### Logs
```
% netstat -an | grep -e 30303 -e 30304 -e 30307 | grep LISTEN
tcp46      0      0  *.30303                *.*                    LISTEN     
tcp46      0      0  *.30304                *.*                    LISTEN   
```
